Package doa.engine.scene.elements.scripts

Class DoaWASDControl

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaComponent
doa.engine.scene.elements.scripts.DoaScript
doa.engine.scene.elements.scripts.DoaWASDControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DoaWASDControl extends DoaScript
A simple WASD keys controller. WASD keys translate the transform of which DoaObject this script is attached to. This script is provided for means of quick and easy debug and shouldn't be used in production.
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:

    void
    tick()
    Do not call this method, merely override it. This method is called by DoaEngine when: This script is added to a DoaObject, The DoaObject this script is added to, is added to a DoaScene, The DoaScene the DoaObject this script is added to, is loaded. Compute the logic of DoaObjects inside this method.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Do not call this method, merely override it. This method is called by DoaEngine when:
      1. This script is added to a DoaObject,
      2. The DoaObject this script is added to, is added to a DoaScene,
      3. The DoaScene the DoaObject this script is added to, is loaded.
      Compute the logic of DoaObjects inside this method.
      Specified by:
      tick in class DoaScript
